amendment.description: Amendment sought to require an analysis of the effect of the proposed pipeline on manipulation of oil markets and increased gas prices for American consumers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 112-181 to require an analysis of the effect of the proposed pipeline on manipulation of oil markets and increased gas prices for American consumers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 261 (Roll no. 648).
